entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
